price: Ako se prođu, pa Allah je, doista, Onaj Koji oprašta grijehe i milostiv je.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
